text: Ralph Philander Ahn (September 28, 1926 â€“ February 26, 2022) was an American actor. He was known for his roles in Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace (1996), Amityville: A New Generation (1993), and Panther (1995). He also appeared in the sitcom New Girl as the silent character Tran. Ahn died on February 26, 2022 in Los Angeles, California at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Educators from Los Angeles
title: Ralph Ahn
